::Feline::

She walked back to the base.  She was having trouble walking on two 
legs, so she transfomed into leopard mode and hobbled on four.  She 
walked into the CR chamber room.  She saw Squizzy and Lady Hawk 
there.  She growled softly. She was hurting and couldn't understand 
why she didn't see either of them at the battle.  All she knew is 
that when her leader called, she went and obeyed. SO why didn't the 
rule apply to everyone.  She didn't know if Zardus had ordered them 
to stay here or not, so instead of open mouth and insert paw, she 
quietly walked into a CR chamber and started to heal.  The slice in 
her side would leave a nasty looking scar, but then, battle wounds 
were proof that one was in battle.
